lead_paragraph: White Sox Manager Ozzie Guillen says Asian players are given privileges in the United States that Latinos are not afforded.
snippet: White Sox Manager Ozzie Guillen says Asian players are given privileges in the United States that Latinos are not afforded.

headline.main: Asians Favored Over Latinos, Guillen Says
headline.seo: Asian Players Treated Better Than Latinos, Guillen Says
headline.print_headline: Asians Favored Over Latinos, Guillen Says
